amount.description: total amount of all shopping cart items in lowest denomination

description.description: free format description of the payment

email.description: customer email for invoices or payment notification

errorUrl.description: final redirect after a failed payment

expiration.description: link expiration date, the link will only be executable until end of that day

intent.description: designates the type of transaction that will be created

modified.description: last modified time in ISO 8601 format

notifyUrl.description: notify url. If unset no notification will be send

paymentProcess.description: identifier of the created payment process.

redirectUrl.description: redirect url. empty if the payment process does not require a redirect.

reference.description: payment reference number, has to be unique per merchant and mode

successUrl.description: final redirect after a successful payment
